Name: ReversEstory
About the game: ReversEstory is a 2D Roguelike action shooting game. Enjoy the freedom of 360° flying while exploring the procedurally generated dungeons. Eliminate all the enemies to open the treasure chest for mysterious weapons. A latitude of items grants the players the power to challenge the darkness within the very depth of the abyss. Aim at the end of the space-time! But you will lose everything when the game is over. All you can reply on is your skills and knowledge about the dungeon. Different characters come with different growth system, level designs and bosses. There’s even a Metroidvania mode you can enjoy. What’s hidden behind? You shall witness and be shocked. Controllers recommended.
